trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventArgs" /> that provides data for the event.
Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreated" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 代表處理 <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreated" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example code provides a method that attaches an event handler for the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreated> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例程式碼提供方法，以附加的事件處理常式<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreated>事件<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>。

trans-unit.source: It also provides a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventHandler> event handler method that writes the name of the type of the components that were created to the <xref:System.Console> when the event handler is raised by a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: 它也提供<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventHandler>將為了所建立的元件類型的名稱寫入的事件處理常式方法<xref:System.Console>時所引發的事件處理常式時<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreated>事件。
